description: This file is a C++ source file implementing the 'Badger' plugin class within the WPEFramework namespace. It handles multiple device and system information retrieval functions, permission validation, and message handling for a media device environment. It also includes several request handlers for app gateway requests, back-end communication, and internal metric processing.
external_methods: PlatformConfig Json parsing and string conversion functions

classes.name: Badger
classes.description: Main plugin class implementing device/system info handling, permissions, and message processing within WPEFramework.

methods.name: const string Initialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Sets up the plugin, queries required interfaces, and initializes internal state.

methods.name: void Deinitialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Cleans up resources and releases interfaces.

methods.name: uint32_t ValidateCachedPermission(const std::string & appId,const std::string & requiredPermission)
methods.description: Checks if the app has the required permission for the requested operation.

methods.name: uint32_t GetHDCPStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & hdcpJson)
methods.description: Retrieves HDCP status JSON; validates permission before accessing delegate.

methods.name: uint32_t GetHDRStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & hdrJson)
methods.description: Retrieves HDR status JSON with permission validation.

methods.name: uint32_t GetWebBrowserStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & webBrowserStatusJson)
methods.description: Retrieves Web Browser status JSON based on system configuration.

methods.name: uint32_t GetWiFiStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & isWifiDeviceStatus)
methods.description: Returns WiFi status JSON; currently simplified to 'true'.

methods.name: uint32_t GetNativeDimensions(const std::string & appId,std::string & nativeDimensionsJson)
methods.description: Returns native display dimensions JSON after permission check.

methods.name: uint32_t GetVideoDimensions(const std::string & appId,std::string & videoDimensionsJson)
methods.description: Returns video display dimensions JSON after permission check.

methods.name: uint32_t GetTimeZone(const std::string & appId,std::string & timeZoneJson)
methods.description: Returns system timezone JSON with permission validation.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceType(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceTypeJson)
methods.description: Returns device type JSON after permission validation.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceModel(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceModelJson)
methods.description: Returns device model JSON after permission validation.

methods.name: uint32_t DeviceInfo(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceInfoJson)
methods.description: Aggregates multiple device-related info (timezone, HDCP, HDR, etc.) into a JSON string.

methods.name: uint32_t DeviceCapabilities(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceCapabilitiesJson)
methods.description: Builds JSON with device capabilities including HDCP, HDR, audio modes, web browser, and display info.

methods.name: uint32_t Shutdown(const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Executes shutdown command via LaunchDelegate after permission validation.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceId(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceIdJson)
methods.description: Gets device ID, using delegate, after permission check.

methods.name: uint32_t DismissLoadingScreen(const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Requests to dismiss loading screen via launch delegate.

methods.name: uint32_t GetLocalizationPostalCode(const std::string & appId,std::string & postalCodeJson)
methods.description: Returns PostalCode based on country code, with fallback.

methods.name: uint32_t ShowToaster(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Displays a toaster message via launch delegate.

methods.name: uint32_t GetPayload(const std::string & appId,std::string & payloadJson)
methods.description: Returns payload info associated with app.

methods.name: uint32_t Settings(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Gathers various system settings into JSON including legacyMiniGuide and powerSaveStatus.

methods.name: uint32_t MediaEventAccountLink(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Marks media event account as linked.

methods.name: uint32_t CompareAppSettings(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Returns a no longer supported message.

methods.name: uint32_t NavigateToFullScreenVideo(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Returns navigation to full screen video.

methods.name: uint32_t LogMoneyBadgerLoaded(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Logs a metrics event for loading.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleMetricsProcessing(const std::string & appId,const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & params)
methods.description: Processes metrics data from JSON parameters, routing according to the 'segment' or 'eventType' fields.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleAppGatewayRequest(const Exchange::Context & context,const std::string & method,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Main handler for app gateway requests. It routes requests based on method name, parsing payload and invoking respective methods, or returning error for unsupported methods.

methods.name: std::string __anon12b35ee20202(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& obj, const char* key)
bool __anon12b35ee20302(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& obj, const char* key, bool defVal)
